channel.title: Soho Theme on Michał Pierzgalski
channel.description: Recent content in Soho Theme on Michał Pierzgalski

item.title: Soho Theme
item.description: Soho is a minimalist two-column hugo theme based on Hyde and inspired by the success of Flex.

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Rich Content
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds.

item.title: Placeholder Text
item.description: Lorem est tota propiore conpellat pectoribus de pectora summo.

item.title: Math Typesetting
item.description: Mathematical notation in a Hugo project can be enabled by using third party JavaScript libraries.

item.title: Emoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways.

item.title: About
item.description: I am an Assistant Professor in the Department of International and Political Studies at the University of Lodz (Wydział Studiów Międzynarodowych i Politologicznych | Uniwersytet Łódzki).

item.title: Dydaktyka
item.description: Rok 2020/2021 (zima) Metodologia badań stosunków międzynarodowych (C) Opis zajęć Notatki do ćwiczeń Lektury (link do folderu z lekturami) Statystyka (W + C) Syllabus (USOS) Notatki do ćwiczeń Statystyka i demografia (W + C) Syllabus (USOS) Notatki do ćwiczeń Rok 2020/2021 (wiosna) Zachowania wyborcze i strategie prowadzenia kampanii wyborczych Seminarium licencjackie

item.title: Research
item.description: My research focuses on voting systems and electoral behavior. I also have an interest in research methodology.

item.title: Teaching
item.description: This year I teach the following courses: 2020/2021 (Fall) Statistics & Demography (L + E) Syllabus My slides for lectures 2020/2021 (Spring) Introduction to electoral systems

item.title: Kontakt | Contact
item.description: Email <- str_c( "michal.pierzgalski", "@", "uni.lodz.pl" ) Department of International and Political Studies

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents.
